title: Research
text:
Peer-viewed articles
Bae, Jihyeon and Don Moon. “Regime Type of an Intergovernmental Organization Membership and Dispute Settlement Mechanisms” at British Journal of Politics and International Relations 2025.
Bae, Jihyeon. “Chinese Patronage and Southeast Asian Democracy in Distress” at Asia-Pacific Social Science Review Vol. 22, Issue. 4, 2022.
Bae, Jihyeon. “Passing the Buck to the Local Level: How Authoritarian China Survives” at Seoul National University Journal of International Studies Vol. 3, Issue. 1, 2018.

title: Jihyeon Bae
text:
Welcome! I am Jihyeon Bae, Ph.D. Candidate in the Department of Political Science at the University of Washington (UW). My dissertation examines international law and organizations used by authoritarian state leaders.



Profile

title: Software
text:
I was fortunate to be part of a fantastic team for the ‘’Data Science for Social Good’’ program in summer 2024. We developed an R package GeoNdxR that allows R users to build user-interactive website (water reuse index as an example)for index creation using their own geospatial data of interest, without any designated server.



Team Pic
